snippet.title: Tom and Jerry in Fists of Furry - Nintendo 64 Gameplay
snippet.description:
NewKidCo had released a share of Tom & Jerry games in the past, mainly on Game Boy Color and Game Boy Advance. Released in 2000, this was one of the rare cases of NewKidCo releasing a Tom & Jerry game on home consoles (and PC), in form of a 3D fighting game, developed by VIS Entertainment (who also developed Earthworm Jim 3D).

A lot of you enjoyed the gameplay video for the sequel (War of the Whiskers), so might as well do it with the original. Enjoy, folks.

Tom &and Jerry (C) Warner Bros. Discovery
Also released on PC
Published in Europe by Ubisoft
